text: Hubert William Kitchen (September 16, 1928 – July 18, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly as a member of the Liberal Party of Newfoundland and Labrador. He also served in cabinet as Minister of Finance and Minister of Health.Encyclopedia of Newfoundland and Labrador Born in Buchans, Newfoundland and Labrador, he attended McGill University, Memorial University, and the University of Alberta, earning B.Comm, B.Ed, M.Ed. and Ph.D. degrees. He was an auditor, school principal, professor of educational administration. He married Jennifer Rooney in 1957 and had a son. Kitchen died on July 18, 2020, in St. John's. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Liberal Party of Newfoundland and Labrador MHAs Category:People from Buchans
title: Hubert Kitchen
